hm2PlatformRadius.name: hm2PlatformRadius

revisions.description: Range of hm2AgentRadiusServerRetransmit adjusted. Behavior of hm2AgentRadiusServerTimeout, hm2AgentRadiusServerRetransmit, hm2AgentRadiusServerDeadtime and hm2AgentRadiusServerSourceIPAddr clarified.
Shared secret key length updated. Radius source interface related object added.

hm2PlatformRadius.contactinfo: Postal: Stuttgarter Str. 45-51 72654 Neckartenzlingen Germany Phone: +49 7127 140 E-mail: hac.support@belden.com
hm2PlatformRadius.description: The Hirschmann Private Platform2 MIB for Client Radius Authentication and Accounting. Copyright (C) 2011-2013. All Rights Reserved.

hm2AgentRadiusMaxTransmit.name: hm2AgentRadiusMaxTransmit
hm2AgentRadiusMaxTransmit.description: Maximum number of retransmissions of a RADIUS request packet

hm2AgentRadiusTimeout.name: hm2AgentRadiusTimeout
hm2AgentRadiusTimeout.description: Time out duration (in seconds) before packets are retransmitted.

hm2AgentRadiusAccountingMode.name: hm2AgentRadiusAccountingMode
hm2AgentRadiusAccountingMode.description: Identifies if RADIUS accounting has been enabled or not.

hm2AgentRadiusStatsClear.name: hm2AgentRadiusStatsClear
hm2AgentRadiusStatsClear.description: When set to enable(1), all RADIUS statistics will be reset.

hm2AgentRadiusAccountingIndexNextValid.name: hm2AgentRadiusAccountingIndexNextValid
hm2AgentRadiusAccountingIndexNextValid.description: Indicates the next valid index into the hm2AgentRadiusAccountingConfigTable for creation. If no additional entries are allowed, this will be 0.

hm2AgentRadiusAccountingConfigTable.name: hm2AgentRadiusAccountingConfigTable
hm2AgentRadiusAccountingConfigTable.description: Table with information about RADIUS accounting server IP addresses, port numbers and shared secrets. Only one entry is supported at this time.

hm2AgentRadiusAccountingConfigEntry.name: hm2AgentRadiusAccountingConfigEntry
hm2AgentRadiusAccountingConfigEntry.description: Entry consisting of configuration data for a RADIUS accounting server.

hm2AgentRadiusAccountingServerIndex.name: hm2AgentRadiusAccountingServerIndex
hm2AgentRadiusAccountingServerIndex.description: Unique index of the configured RADIUS accounting server. The next valid value of this object for creation is specified by hm2AgentRadiusAccountingIndexNextValid.

hm2AgentRadiusAccountingServerAddress.name: hm2AgentRadiusAccountingServerAddress
hm2AgentRadiusAccountingServerAddress.description: This object is deprecated in favour of hm2AgentRadiusAccountingServerAddr. IP Address of the configured RADIUS accounting server. This object cannot be changed after creation.

hm2AgentRadiusAccountingServerAddressTyp.name: hm2AgentRadiusAccountingServerAddressType
hm2AgentRadiusAccountingServerAddressTyp.description: This object is deprecated in favour of hm2AgentRadiusAccountingServerAddrType. IP Address Type of the configured RADIUS accounting server. This object cannot be changed after creation.

hm2AgentRadiusAccountingPort.name: hm2AgentRadiusAccountingPort
hm2AgentRadiusAccountingPort.description: Port number for the RADIUS accounting server.

hm2AgentRadiusAccountingSecret.name: hm2AgentRadiusAccountingSecret
hm2AgentRadiusAccountingSecret.description: Configured shared sercret for the RADIUS accounting server.

hm2AgentRadiusAccountingStatus.name: hm2AgentRadiusAccountingStatus
hm2AgentRadiusAccountingStatus.description: Creates or destroys a RADIUS accounting server entry. During creation, the next available index is specified by the hm2AgentRadiusAccountingIndexNextValid object. Rows creation using a different value for hm2AgentRadiusAccountingServerIndex will fail. active(1) - This entry is active. notInService(2) - This entry is administratively disabled. notReady(3) - DNS resolution of host name has failed. createAndGo(4) - Creates a new entry. createAndWait(5)- Creates a new entry. destroy(6) - Deletes an entry.

hm2AgentRadiusAccountingServerName.name: hm2AgentRadiusAccountingServerName
hm2AgentRadiusAccountingServerName.description: Configured identification name for the RADIUS accounting server.

hm2AgentRadiusAccountingServerAddrType.name: hm2AgentRadiusAccountingServerAddrType
hm2AgentRadiusAccountingServerAddrType.description: Inet address type of the configured RADIUS accounting server. This object cannot be changed after creation.

hm2AgentRadiusAccountingServerAddr.name: hm2AgentRadiusAccountingServerAddr
hm2AgentRadiusAccountingServerAddr.description: Inet address of the configured RADIUS accounting server. This object cannot be changed after creation.

hm2AgentRadiusServerIndexNextValid.name: hm2AgentRadiusServerIndexNextValid
hm2AgentRadiusServerIndexNextValid.description: Indicates the next valid index into the hm2AgentRadiusServerConfigTable for creation. If no additional entries are allowed, this will be 0.

hm2AgentRadiusServerConfigTable.name: hm2AgentRadiusServerConfigTable
hm2AgentRadiusServerConfigTable.description: Table with information about RADIUS authentication server IP addresses, port numbers and shared secrets.

hm2AgentRadiusServerConfigEntry.name: hm2AgentRadiusServerConfigEntry
hm2AgentRadiusServerConfigEntry.description: Entry consisting of configuration data for a RADIUS authentication server.

hm2AgentRadiusServerIndex.name: hm2AgentRadiusServerIndex
hm2AgentRadiusServerIndex.description: Unique index of the configured RADIUS server

hm2AgentRadiusServerAddressType.name: hm2AgentRadiusServerAddressType
hm2AgentRadiusServerAddressType.description: This object is deprecated in favour of hm2AgentRadiusServerInetAddrType. IP Address Type of the configured RADIUS server. This object cannot be changed after creation.

hm2AgentRadiusServerPort.name: hm2AgentRadiusServerPort
hm2AgentRadiusServerPort.description: Port number for the RADIUS server.

hm2AgentRadiusServerSecret.name: hm2AgentRadiusServerSecret
hm2AgentRadiusServerSecret.description: Configured shared sercret for the RADIUS server.

hm2AgentRadiusServerPrimaryMode.name: hm2AgentRadiusServerPrimaryMode
hm2AgentRadiusServerPrimaryMode.description: Configure the RADIUS server to be the primary server. If there is any other server that is configured to be primary, that server is set to be a seconday server and this entry is set primary.

hm2AgentRadiusServerCurrentMode.name: hm2AgentRadiusServerCurrentMode
hm2AgentRadiusServerCurrentMode.description: Indicate if the RADIUS server is the current server in use for authentication.

hm2AgentRadiusServerMsgAuth.name: hm2AgentRadiusServerMsgAuth
hm2AgentRadiusServerMsgAuth.description: Enable or disable the message authenticator attribute for this RADIUS server.

hm2AgentRadiusServerRowStatus.name: hm2AgentRadiusServerRowStatus
hm2AgentRadiusServerRowStatus.description: Creates or destroys a RADIUS authentication server entry. During creation, the next available index is specified by the hm2AgentRadiusServerIndexNextValid object. Rows creation using a different value for hm2AgentRadiusServerIndex will fail. active(1) - This entry is active. notInService(2) - This entry is administratively disabled. notReady(3) - DNS resolution of host name has failed. createAndGo(4) - Creates a new entry. createAndWait(5)- Creates a new entry. destroy(6) - Deletes an entry.

hm2AgentRadiusServerName.name: hm2AgentRadiusServerName
hm2AgentRadiusServerName.description: Configured identification name for the RADIUS server.

hm2AgentRadiusServerInetAddress.name: hm2AgentRadiusServerInetAddress
hm2AgentRadiusServerInetAddress.description: This object is deprecated in favour of hm2AgentRadiusServerInetAddr. IP Address of the configured RADIUS server. This object cannot be changed after creation.

hm2AgentRadiusServerTimeout.name: hm2AgentRadiusServerTimeout
hm2AgentRadiusServerTimeout.description: Time out duration (in seconds) before packets are retransmitted. Note that hm2AgentRadiusTimeout will override this MIB object: - During row creation, hm2AgentRadiusTimeout specifies the default value. - Writing to hm2AgentRadiusTimeout will also update the value of this MIB object for all existing rows.

hm2AgentRadiusServerRetransmit.name: hm2AgentRadiusServerRetransmit
hm2AgentRadiusServerRetransmit.description: Maximum number of retransmissions of a RADIUS request packet Note that hm2AgentRadiusMaxTransmit will override this MIB object: - During row creation, hm2AgentRadiusMaxTransmit specifies the default value. - Writing to hm2AgentRadiusMaxTransmit will also update the value of this MIB object for all existing rows.

hm2AgentRadiusServerDeadtime.name: hm2AgentRadiusServerDeadtime
hm2AgentRadiusServerDeadtime.description: Length of time (in minutes) for which a RADIUS server is skipped over by transaction requests. Note that hm2AgentRadiusDeadTime will override this MIB object: - During row creation, hm2AgentRadiusDeadTime specifies the default value. - Writing to hm2AgentRadiusDeadTime will also update the value of this MIB object for all existing rows.

hm2AgentRadiusServerSourceIPAddr.name: hm2AgentRadiusServerSourceIPAddr
hm2AgentRadiusServerSourceIPAddr.description: Source IP address that will be used for the communication with RADIUS servers. Note that hm2AgentRadiusSourceIPAddr will override this MIB object: - During row creation, hm2AgentRadiusSourceIPAddr specifies the default value. - Writing to hm2AgentRadiusSourceIPAddr will also update the value of this MIB object for all existing rows.

hm2AgentRadiusServerPriority.name: hm2AgentRadiusServerPriority
hm2AgentRadiusServerPriority.description: Priority specifies the order in which the servers will be used, where 0 is the highest priority in radius server config mode.

hm2AgentRadiusServerUsageType.name: hm2AgentRadiusServerUsageType
hm2AgentRadiusServerUsageType.description: Specify the usage type of the server.

hm2AgentRadiusServerInetAddrType.name: hm2AgentRadiusServerInetAddrType
hm2AgentRadiusServerInetAddrType.description: Inet address type of the configured RADIUS server. This object cannot be changed after creation.

hm2AgentRadiusServerInetAddr.name: hm2AgentRadiusServerInetAddr
hm2AgentRadiusServerInetAddr.description: Inet address of the configured RADIUS server. This object cannot be changed after creation.

hm2AgentRadiusAuthenticationServers.name: hm2AgentRadiusAuthenticationServers
hm2AgentRadiusAuthenticationServers.description: Number of RADIUS authentication servers that have been configured.

hm2AgentRadiusAccountingServers.name: hm2AgentRadiusAccountingServers
hm2AgentRadiusAccountingServers.description: Number of RADIUS accounting servers that have been configured.

hm2AgentRadiusNamedAuthenticationServerG.name: hm2AgentRadiusNamedAuthenticationServerGroups
hm2AgentRadiusNamedAuthenticationServerG.description: Number of configured RADIUS named authentication server groups.

hm2AgentRadiusNamedAccountingServerGroup.name: hm2AgentRadiusNamedAccountingServerGroups
hm2AgentRadiusNamedAccountingServerGroup.description: Number of configured RADIUS named accounting server groups.

hm2AgentRadiusDeadTime.name: hm2AgentRadiusDeadTime
hm2AgentRadiusDeadTime.description: Length of time (in minutes) for which a RADIUS server is skipped over by transaction requests.

hm2AgentRadiusSourceIPAddr.name: hm2AgentRadiusSourceIPAddr
hm2AgentRadiusSourceIPAddr.description: Source IP address that will be used for the communication with RADIUS servers.

hm2AgentRadiusNasIpAddress.name: hm2AgentRadiusNasIpAddress
hm2AgentRadiusNasIpAddress.description: Used to set the NAS-IP address for the radius server.

hm2AgentAuthorizationNetworkRadiusMode.name: hm2AgentAuthorizationNetworkRadiusMode
hm2AgentAuthorizationNetworkRadiusMode.description: Used to enable/disable VLAN assignment mode.

hm2AgentRadiusSourceInterface.name: hm2AgentRadiusSourceInterface
hm2AgentRadiusSourceInterface.description: A source-interface selection on an Interface Index (like vlan based routing interface, port based routing interface, loopback interface). A non-zero value indicates ifIndex for the corresponding interface entry in the ifTable is selected. A zero value indicates the source-interface un-selection. The frames will not necessarily be sent on this interface, only the IP address of the interface will be used as source.
